ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Sorta new
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, now (unless you choose not to) you start your character in a tutorial. And I advice you to do the tutorial. You ll get a nice little charm just for
ygData.messageBody:
Well, now (unless you choose not to) you start your
character in a tutorial. And I advice you to do the
tutorial. You'll get a nice little charm just for
talking to all the folks there. And you can get to lvl
5 fairly easy with not as much fear of being killed.

You'll probably be ok with just what comes with
Evolutions for a while. LDoN, GoD and OoW are all for
higher levels. (Well, you can technically start using
LDoN at lvl 15, but you can't go on an adventure until
you're 20)

Welcome back to Norrath!


--- Starshyyn <starshyyn@...> wrote:

> Merry Meet!
>
> I have a sorta newby question. Last spring I bought
> Evolution thinking I would
> re-join Norrath. Well, apparently not! My system
> couldn't handle the change
> on the first of April (no matter what I tried, my
> sad, tired machine couldn't deal
> with the changes). So, now I have a new machine
> that will work with the game
> and will be getting dsl shortly. I will be using
> the game I bought (Evolution) and
> would like to know if any of the expansions beyond
> LoY offer anything for the
> 'new', young player or if they are mostly for above
> levels 20, 30, 40, 50 or more?
>
> When I first played (on a borrowed account to see if
> I would like it) I couldn't get
> out of the room/building where I was created!!! It
> was hysterical! My Mentor had
> to come get me! and he was kos in Felwithe! I
> definately won't be repeating
> that scenario......LOL
>
> Starshyyn (I hope)
> Tarew Marr (soon)
> (and others)
>
>
>


=====
~~~~~~~~~

Sarchasm: The gulf between the author of sarcastic wit and the recipient who just doesn't get it.
